SKU Description: Powered by the Acronis Any Data Engine, Acronis Backup Advanced delivers robust, easy-to-use unified data protection and disaster recovery for multisystem environments. Deploy individual solutions or integrate into one efficient solution and manage all tasks with a single console. In minutes, users can recover individual files, application data or a complete system to any location, reducing downtime and ensuring data protection.
SKU Capabilities: Local backup | Cloud backup | Hybrid backup | Offsite backup (stored) | Frequency of backup

SKU Description: Acronis Disaster Recovery Service is a complete IT business continuity solution that protects and restores data, servers or entire data centres suffering from natural or man-made disasters. It backs up and replicates systems into an on-site appliance and Acronis cloud data centre. In case of outage, Acronis can recover and restart the systems locally or in the cloud so customers can continue providing IT services to internal and external constituents until they can safely fail back. Acronis Disaster Recovery Service can protect any physical or virtual system in any environment and any location.
SKU Capabilities: Fast recovery | Disaster recovery for physical and virtual workloads | Production failover | Test DR readiness | Point-in-time recovery

SKU Description: Adobe Creative Cloud gives users access to a collection of software developed by Adobe for graphic design, video editing, web development, photography, and cloud services.
SKU Capabilities: Design | Video editing | Web development | Photography | Illustration | Cloud services

SKU Description: Adobe Acrobat DC combines Acrobat desktop software with PDF services* and the Acrobat Reader mobile app to deliver the complete PDF solution for today’s mobile, connected world. Give users the tools they need to create, edit, and sign PDFs—anywhere, on any device. And protect your systems and data with Adobe’s highest levels of security.
SKU Capabilities: PDF Reader | PDF Editor

SKU Description: Adobe Acrobat is a family of application software solutions and web services developed by Adobe Inc. to view, create, manipulate, print, and manage Portable Document Format (PDF) files.
SKU Capabilities: View, print, and comment on PDF documents

SKU Description: Adobe Sign, part of the Adobe Document Cloud suite of services, is a cloud-based e-signature service that allows the user to send, sign, track, and manage signature processes using a browser or mobile device.
SKU Capabilities: Cloud-based e-signatures

SKU Description: AWS Auto Scaling monitors your applications and automatically adjusts capacity to maintain steady, predictable performance at the lowest possible cost. Using AWS Auto Scaling, it’s easy to set up application scaling for multiple resources across multiple services in minutes.
SKU Capabilities: Unified scaling | Automatic resource discovery | Built-in scaling strategies | Predictive scaling | Fully-managed, smart scaling policies

SKU Description: AWS Backup is a fully managed service that centralises and automates data protection across AWS services and hybrid workloads. It provides core data protection features, ransomware recovery capabilities, and compliance insights and analytics for data protection policies and operations. AWS Backup offers a cost-effective, policy-based service with features that simplify data protection at exabyte scale across your AWS estate.
SKU Capabilities: Data protection of application resources on AWS and hybrid services | Multi-account and multi-region ransomware recovery | Data protection compliance with real-time analytics and insights

SKU Description: AWS Budgets gives you the ability to set custom budgets that alert you when your costs or usage exceed (or are forecasted to exceed) your budgeted amount.
SKU Capabilities: Track service costs and usage within AWS Service Catalog | Associate budgets with AWS Service Catalog products and portfolios

SKU Description: AWS CloudFormation is an infrastructure as code (IaC) service that allows you to easily model, provision, and manage AWS and third-party resources.
SKU Capabilities: Extensibility | Cross account & cross-region management | Authoring with JSON/YAML | Authoring with familiar programming languages | Build serverless applications with SAM | Safety controls | Preview changes to your environment | Dependency management

SKU Description: Amazon CloudWatch is a monitoring and management service that provides data and actionable insights for AWS, hybrid, and on-premises applications and infrastructure resources. You can collect and access all your performance and operational data in the form of logs and metrics from a single platform rather than monitoring them in silos (server, network, or database). CloudWatch enables you to monitor your complete stack (applications, infrastructure, network, and services) and use alarms, logs, and event data to take automated actions and reduce mean time to resolution (MTTR). This frees up important resources and allows you to focus on building applications and business value.
SKU Capabilities: Easily collect and store logs | Cross-account observability across multiple AWS accounts | Automate response to operational changes with CloudWatch Events | Log analytics | Compliance and security

SKU Description: AWS Config allows you to assess, audit, and evaluate configurations of your resources.
SKU Capabilities: Configuration history of AWS resources | Configuration history of software | Resource relationships tracking | Configurable and customisable rules | Conformance packs | Multi-account, multi-region data aggregation | Extensibility | Configuration snapshots | Cloud | Partner solutions governance dashboard

SKU Description: The AWS Direct Connect cloud service is the shortest path to your AWS resources. While in transit, your network traffic remains on the AWS global network and never touches the public internet. This reduces the chance of hitting bottlenecks or unexpected increases in latency. When creating a new connection, you can choose a hosted connection provided by an AWS Direct Connect Delivery Partner, or choose a dedicated connection from AWS—and deploy at over 100 AWS Direct Connect locations around the globe. With AWS Direct Connect SiteLink, you can send data between AWS Direct Connect locations to create private network connections between the offices and data centres in your global network.
SKU Capabilities: AWS Direct Connect Locations Worldwide | Connection speeds up to 100 Gbps | MACsec and IPsec encryption options | SiteLink | Multiple deployment options

SKU Description:
Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed, serverless, key-value NoSQL database designed to run high-performance applications at any scale. 

Performance at scale: Key-value and document database that supports tables of virtually any size with horizontal scaling. Scales to more than 10 trillion requests per day and with tables that have more than ten million read and write requests per second and petabytes of data storage.

Performance: No servers to provision, patch, or manage, and no software to install, maintain, or operate. Automatically scales tables to adjust for capacity and maintains performance with zero administration. Availability and fault tolerance are built in, eliminating the need to architect your applications for these capabilities.

Enterprise ready: Built for mission-critical workloads, including support for atomicity, consistency, isolation, and durability (ACID) transactions for a broad set of applications that require complex business logic. Helps secure your data with encryption and continuously backs up your data for protection, with guaranteed reliability through a service level.
SKU Capabilities: Built-in security | Continuous backups | Automated multi-region replication | In-memory caching | Data import and export tools

SKU Description: Amazon Elastic Block Store (AWS EBS) is an easy-to-use, scalable, high-performance block-storage service designed for Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2).
SKU Capabilities: Amazon data lifecycle manager for EBS snapshots | Amazon EBS Elastic Volumes | Amazon EBS Snapshots | Amazon EBS-optimised instances | Amazon EBS availability and durability | Amazon EBS encryption | AWS identity and access management

SKU Description: Amazon Elastic File System (AWS EFS) automatically grows and shrinks as you add and remove files with no need for management or provisioning.
SKU Capabilities: Amazon EFS Infrequent Access | Amazon EFS Intelligent-Tiering

SKU Description: Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) is a managed Kubernetes service that makes it easy for you to run Kubernetes on AWS and on-premises. Kubernetes is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications. Amazon EKS is certified Kubernetes-conformant, so existing applications that run on upstream Kubernetes are compatible with Amazon EKS. With Amazon EKS, you can take advantage of all the performance, scale, reliability, and availability of AWS infrastructure, as well as integrations with AWS networking and security services, such as application load balancers (ALBs) for load distribution, AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) integration with role-based access control (RBAC), and AWS Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) support for pod networking.
SKU Capabilities: Automatically manages availability/scalability of Kubernetes control plane nodes responsible for scheduling containers, managing application availability, storing cluster data, and other key tasks | Run Kubernetes apps on Amazon EC2 and AWS Fargate

SKU Description: Amazon Elastic Load Balancing (ELB) automatically distributes incoming application traffic across multiple targets and virtual appliances in one or more Availability Zones (AZs).
SKU Capabilities: Application Load Balancer | Network Load Balancer | Gateway Load Balancer | Classic Load Balancer

SKU Description: For user or team file shares, and file-based application migrations, Amazon FSx File Gateway provides low-latency, on-premises access to fully managed file shares in Amazon FSx for Windows File Server.
SKU Capabilities: Extends the AWS Cloud to your data centre | Requires no changes to existing applications | Reduces physical infrastructure, cost, and complexity

SKU Description: With Amazon Identity and Access Management (AWS IAM), you can specify who or what can access services and resources in AWS, centrally manage fine-grained permissions, and analyse access to refine permissions across AWS.
SKU Capabilities: IAM Access Analyser | IAM Identity Centre | Manage IAM permissions | Manage IAM roles | MFA

SKU Description: AWS Inspector is an automated vulnerability management service that continually scans AWS workloads for software vulnerabilities and unintended network exposure.
SKU Capabilities: Vulnerability management for compute workloads | Simplified one-click onboarding and integration with AWS Organisations | Automated discovery and continual vulnerability scanning | AWS Systems Manager Agent | Inspector risk score for findings | Suppression of findings | Automatic closure of remediated findings | Detailed coverage monitoring | Integration with Security Hub and EventBridge | Vulnerability mapping to layers in Lambda functions

SKU Description: AWS IoT Core lets you connect billions of IoT devices and route trillions of messages to AWS services without managing infrastructure.
SKU Capabilities: AWS IoT Device SDK | Device Advisor | Device Gateway | Message Broker | Authentication and authorisation | Registry | Device Shadow | Rules Engine | AWS IoT Core for LoRaWAN | Device Location

SKU Description: Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics is the easiest way to transform and analyse streaming data in real time using Apache Flink.
SKU Capabilities: Stream processing applications using Apache Flink | Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics Studio | Kinesis Data Analytics SQL applications

SKU Description: Amazon Kinesis Data Streams is a serverless streaming data service that makes it easy to capture, process, and store data streams at any scale.
SKU Capabilities: Serverless | Highly available and durable | Low latency | Dedicated throughput per consumer | Choose between on-demand and provisioned capacity mode | Secure and compliant | Integrated with other AWS services

SKU Description: Amazon Relational Database Service (AWS RDS) is a collection of managed services that makes it simple to set up, operate, and scale databases in the cloud. Choose from seven popular engines—Amazon Aurora with MySQL compatibility, Amazon Aurora with PostgreSQL compatibility, MySQL, MariaDB, PostgreSQL, Oracle, and SQL Server—and deploy on-premises with Amazon RDS on AWS Outposts.
SKU Capabilities: Lower administrative burden | Fast performance, scalability, availability, and durability | Security | Manageability | Cost-effectiveness | Developer productivity

SKU Description: AWS Security Hub is a cloud security posture management service that performs automated, continuous security best practice checks against your AWS resources. Security Hub aggregates your security alerts (i.e. findings) from various AWS services and partner products in a standardised format so that you can more easily take action on them. To maintain a complete view of your security posture in AWS, you need to integrate multiple tools and services including threat detections from Amazon GuardDuty, vulnerabilities from Amazon Inspector, sensitive data classifications from Amazon Macie, resource configuration issues from AWS Config, and AWS Partner Network Products. Security Hub simplifies how you understand and improve your security posture with automated security best practice checks powered by AWS Config rules and automated integrations with dozens of AWS services and partner products.
SKU Capabilities: Automated, continuous security best practice checks | Consolidated findings across AWS services and partner integrations | A single, standardised data format for all of your findings | Security standards aligned to regulatory and industry compliance frameworks | Automated response, remediation, and enrichment actions | Multi-account and AWS Organisations support | Cross-Region aggregation of findings | Integrations with ticketing, chat, incident management, investigation, GRC, SOAR, and SIEM tools | Security scores and summary dashboards | Filtering, grouping, and saved searches for your findings

SKU Description: Customers currently using Server Migration Service (SMS) are encouraged to switch to Application Migration Service for future migrations. AWS Application Migration Service (AWS MGN) is the primary migration service recommended for lift-and-shift migrations to AWS.
SKU Capabilities: Simplify and expedite migration to the cloud | Quickly realise benefits of migration with minimal downtime and no changes | Migrate apps from physical infrastructure, VMware vSphere, Microsoft Hyper-V, Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (AmazonEC2), Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC), and other clouds to AWS

SKU Description: Amazon Simple Notification Service (AWS SNS) sends notifications two ways: A2A and A2P. A2A provides high-throughput, push-based, many-to-many messaging between distributed systems, microservices, and event-driven serverless applications. These applications include Amazon Simple Queue Service (SQS), Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose, AWS Lambda, and other HTTPS endpoints. A2P functionality lets you send messages to your customers with SMS texts, push notifications, and email.
SKU Capabilities: Standard Topics | FIFO topics | Maximum throughput | High throughput | Best-effort ordering | Strict ordering | Best-effort deduplication | Strict deduplication | Multiple subscription types | SQS FIFO subscriptions | Message fanout

SKU Description: AWS Storage Gateway is a hybrid cloud storage service that gives you on-premises access to virtually unlimited cloud storage. You can use Storage Gateway to simplify storage management and reduce costs for key hybrid cloud storage use cases. These include moving backups to the cloud, using on-premises file shares backed by cloud storage, and providing low-latency access to data in AWS for on-premises applications. To support these use cases, the service provides four different types of gateways—Tape Gateway, Amazon S3 File Gateway, Amazon FSx File Gateway, and Volume Gateway—that seamlessly connect on-premises applications to cloud storage, caching data locally for low-latency access.
SKU Capabilities: Standard storage protocols | Fully managed cache | Optimised and secure data transfer | High availability on VMware

SKU Description: AWS Systems Manager is a secure end-to-end management solution for hybrid cloud environments and the operations hub for your AWS applications and resources. It is broken into four core feature groups: Operations, Application, Change, and Node.
SKU Capabilities: Operations management | Application management | Change management | Node management

SKU Description: Amazon Simple Storage Service (AWS S3) is an object storage service offering industry-leading scalability, data availability, security, and performance. With cost-effective storage classes and easy-to-use management features, you can optimise costs, organise data, and configure fine-tuned access controls to meet specific business, organisational, and compliance requirements.
SKU Capabilities: Access points | Batch operations | Block public access | Cost optimisation | Multi-region access points | Object Lambda | Object lock | Replication | Storage Lens | S3 on Outposts

AWS Site-to-Site VPN features: Web traffic filtering | AWS WAF Bot Control | Account takeover fraud prevention | Full feature API | Real-time visibility | Integration with AWS Firewall Manager

SKU Description: Amazon WorkSpaces provides a secure, managed Desktop-as-a-Service (DaaS) to your end users.
SKU Capabilities: Provision Windows or Linux desktops to users anytime, anywhere, from any supported device | Strengthen security by storing data on AWS instead of vulnerable endpoint devices | Pay only for what you use | Scale quickly to thousands of desktops across the globe

SKU Description: AppGuard, a Blue Planet-works company, provides award-winning server and endpoint cybersecurity protection for enterprises as well as small and medium-sized businesses. AppGuard's patented inheritance technology maintains the same level of guarding and isolation on any process spawned from a risky application. The technology does not rely on detection and response and instead prevents.

SKU Description: Understand your Microsoft 365 global licenses and consumption at a glance, and detect unused and inappropriately assigned licenses across your tenants from a central SaaS management platform.

SKU Description: Quickly and easily optimise your Azure deployments. Azure Advisor analyses your configurations and usage telemetry and offers personalised, actionable recommendations to help you optimise your Azure resources for reliability, security, operational excellence, performance, and cost.

SKU Description: Application Insights, a feature of Azure Monitor, is widely used within the enterprise landscape for monitoring and diagnostics. Data that has already been collected from a specific tenant or environment is pushed to your own Application Insights environment. The data is stored in Azure Monitor logs by Application Insights, and visualised in Performance and Failures panels under Investigate on the left pane. The data is exported to your Application Insights environment in the standard schema defined by Application Insights. The support, developer, and admin personas can use this feature to triage and resolve issues.

SKU Description: Azure Backup is a cost-effective, secure, one-click backup solution that’s scalable based on your backup storage needs. SKU Description: Take advantage of fully managed file shares in the cloud that are accessible via the industry-standard SMB and NFS protocols. Azure Files shares can be mounted concurrently by cloud or on-premises deployments of Windows, Linux, and macOS. Azure Files shares can also be cached on Windows Servers with Azure File Sync for fast access near where the data is being used.

SKU Description: Azure File Sync enables centralising your organisation's file shares in Azure Files, while keeping the flexibility, performance, and compatibility of a Windows file server. While some users may opt to keep a full copy of their data locally, Azure File Sync additionally has the ability to transform Windows Server into a quick cache of your Azure file share.

SKU Description: Azure Firewall is a managed, cloud-based network security service that protects your Azure Virtual Network resources. SKU Capabilities: Threat intelligence-based filtering | Unified management | Transport Layer Security (TLS) inspection | Simple deployment and management

SKU Description: Create and develop industry-specific cloud solutions on the only platform with intelligent edge-to-cloud technologies that come with security, privacy, and compliance built-in. SKU Capabilities: Edge AI | Best-in-class development tools | Single control pane | Largest ecosystem in the industry

SKU Description: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) simplifies deploying a managed Kubernetes cluster in Azure by offloading the operational overhead to Azure. As a hosted Kubernetes service, Azure handles critical tasks, like health monitoring and maintenance. Since Kubernetes masters are managed by Azure, you only manage and maintain the agent nodes. Thus, AKS is free; you only pay for the agent nodes within your clusters, not for the masters.
SKU Capabilities: Innovate, deploy, and operate Kubernetes seamlessly

SKU Description: Get all the Azure migration tools and guidance you need to plan and implement your move to the cloud—and track your progress using a central dashboard that provides intelligent insights.

SKU Description: Azure Reservations help you save money by committing to one-year or three-year plans for multiple products. Committing allows you to get a discount on the resources you use. Reservations can significantly reduce your resource costs by up to 72% from pay-as-you-go prices. Reservations provide a billing discount and don't affect the runtime state of your resources. After you purchase a reservation, the discount automatically applies to matching resources.

SKU Description: It is critical now more than ever that SMB owners are empowered with the information needed to make crucial decisions. Business Central is a single end-to-end solution for managing all your business processes. SKU: Google Cloud Backup and Disaster Recovery
SKU Description: Google Cloud Backup and DR is a managed backup and disaster recovery service for centralised data protection.
SKU Capabilities: “Incremental-forever” backups | Instant mount and recovery | Application-consistent database backups | Reduced operational burden | Broad database support

SKU Description:
Google Cloud Bigtable is a fully managed, scalable NoSQL database service for large analytical and operational workloads with up to 99.999% availability. 

High throughput at low latency:
Bigtable is ideal for storing very large amounts of data in a key-value store and supports high read and write throughput at low latency for fast access to large amounts of data. Throughput scales linearly—you can increase QPS (queries per second) by adding Bigtable nodes. Bigtable is built with proven infrastructure that powers Google products used by billions such as Search and Maps.

Cluster resizing without downtime:
Scale seamlessly from thousands to millions of reads/writes per second. Bigtable throughput can be dynamically adjusted by adding or removing cluster nodes—all without any downtime. Bigtable can also autoscale your cluster based on changes in demand so that you can maintain great performance in the most cost-effective way.

Flexible, automated replication to optimise any workload:
Write data once and automatically replicate where needed with eventual consistency—giving you control for high availability and isolation of read and write workloads. No manual steps needed to ensure consistency, repair data, or synchronise writes and deletes. Benefit from a high availability SLA of 99.999% for instances with multi-cluster routing across 3 or more regions (99.9% for single-cluster instances).

Enterprise-grade security and controls:
Customer-managed encryption keys (CMEK) with External Key Manager support, IAM integration for access and controls, support for VPC-SC, and comprehensive audit logging help ensure your data is protected and complies with regulations.
SKU Capabilities: High throughput at low latency | Cluster resizing without downtime | Flexible, automated replication to optimise any workload | Enterprise-grade security and controls

SKU: Google Cloud Billing Budgets and Alerts
SKU Description: Avoid surprises on your bill by creating Cloud Billing budgets to monitor all of your Google Cloud charges in one place. A budget enables you to track your actual Google Cloud spend against your planned spend. After you've set a budget amount, you set budget alert threshold rules that are used to trigger email notifications. Budget alert emails help you stay informed about how your spend is tracking against your budget. You can also use budgets to automate cost control responses.
SKU Capabilities: Support threshold rules | Specify time periods | Define scope of the budget to the entire billing account | Narrow the scope to a specific project or service

SKU Capabilities: Future-proof infrastructure | Powerful data and analytics | Machine learning

SKU Description: Google Cloud uses quotas to restrict how much of a particular shared Google Cloud resource you can use. Each quota represents a specific countable resource, such as API calls to a particular service, the number of load balancers used concurrently by your project, or the number of projects that you can create. For example, you can set your own limits on service usage while developing and testing your applications to avoid unexpected bills from using expensive resources.
SKU Capabilities: Protect the community of Google Cloud users | Prevent unforeseen spikes in usage and overloaded services | Manage resources | Set limits on service usage | Avoid unexpected bills

SKU Description:
Google Cloud Security Command Centre is the security and risk management platform for Google Cloud.
Discover and view your assets in near-real time across App Engine, BigQuery, Cloud SQL, Cloud Storage, Compute Engine, Cloud Identity and Access Management, Google Kubernetes Engine, and more. Review historical discovery scans to identify new, modified, or deleted assets. Understand the security state of your Google Cloud assets. Uncover common web application vulnerabilities such as cross-site scripting or outdated libraries in your web applications running on App Engine, GKE, and Compute Engine. Quickly resolve misconfigurations by clicking directly on the impacted resource and following the prescribed steps on how to fix it. Detect threats using logs running in Google Cloud at scale. Detect crypto mining threats and some of the most common container attacks, including suspicious binary, suspicious library, and reverse shell.
SKU Capabilities: Asset discovery and inventory | Threat prevention | Threat detection

SKU Description: Google Cloud Spanner is a fully managed, horizontally scalable, globally consistent relational database with unlimited scale, strong consistency, and up to 99.999% availability.

Trellix collects extensive threat intelligence through first-hand breach investigations and millions of sensors. And Email Security Server uses this data, concrete evidence, and contextual intelligence to help you prioritise alerts and block threats in real time. By integrating with additional Trellix extended detection and response (XDR) products, you can get broader visibility into multisector blended attacks and coordinate real-time protection.

SKU Description: The endpoint solution you depend on should align with the priorities that matter most to you. With Trellix ENS and Trellix Insights you can protect your organisation before an attack by using specific threat priorities. The solution enables you to ensure system uptime for users, find more opportunities for automation, and simplify complex workflows.

SKU Description: Protect your employees and their mobile devices with Trellix Mobile Security. Mobile Security uses machine learning capabilities fed by billions of data points from millions of devices to identify current or imminent threats and attacks, including ones that have never been seen before.

SKU Description: Trellix Network DLP consists of three modules (Prevent, Discovery, and Monitor). By combining all these pieces, organisations enjoy integrated security which reduces the risk of data loss and helps improve the maturity of security processes. It also allows them to move past reactive operations which can’t keep up with the volume, speed, and sophistication of today’s threats and attain a fully optimised proactive security process.
SKU Capabilities: Lack of data classification | Sharing permissions | Embedded documents | Embedded Macros

SKU Description:
Vulnerability Assessment provides an insight into an organisation’s current state of security, and the effectiveness of its countermeasures. Vulnerability Assessments is performed in two formats:
1. External Vulnerability Assessment: Performed remotely with no internal access provided to our SOC team. The goal of this test is to identify and classify the weaknesses of the internet-facing IT assets of an organisation such as Web applications, web servers, network endpoints, VPN, and e-mail servers. This test helps an organisation to learn what external IT assets need security controls, patches, and general hardening.
2. Internal Vulnerability Assessment: Performed from within the premises of the target organisation, usually to identify and classify threats and weaknesses in the internal network. It helps an organisation determine its compliance to global or local policies, standards and procedures in terms of information security, data protection and segmentation of networks.
SKU Capabilities: External Vulnerability Assessment | Internal Vulnerability Assessment

SKU Description: Yammer connects leaders, communicators, and employees to build communities, share knowledge, and engage everyone. Yammer helps you connect and engage across your organisation, so you can discuss ideas, share updates, and network with others.
SKU Capabilities: Messaging | Communication channels
